guide.introduction: this fan has a big enough compartment inside to hide your stuff and it's powered with a 12 v regulator
guide.introduction_rendered: this fan has a big enough compartment inside to hide your stuff and it's powered with a 12 v regulator

lines.text: first, remove all the screws and leave only the fan and some of the cable and after that make the connections and your done
lines.text_raw: first, remove all the screws and leave only the fan and some of the cable and after that make the connections and your done

guide.summary: This is a power supply from a old computer that was for the trash and I made it into a fan.You will need a 12 v regulator and some screwdrivers to open it up and take the small fan and after that connect it to the regulator, close the box and if you want
guide.title: SAFE FAN
